name: Application Installed Check
description: Verifies that a specific application is installed on the system by checking registry and installed packages.

parameters.name: appName
parameters.help: The name of the application to check (supports partial match, case-insensitive).

parameters.name: exactMatch
parameters.help: If true, requires exact name match (case-insensitive). If false, allows partial match.

parameters.name: checkRegistry
parameters.help: If true, checks Windows registry for installed applications.

parameters.name: checkPackages
parameters.help: If true, checks installed packages using Get-Package.
